A little dumb and a lot dated, yet still marginally enjoyable if you're into retro shooters with lots of kabooms.

In the end, Spectral Force 3 is more disappointing than bad.
Some board games translate well. This doesn't. [Aug 2008, p.99]
Dynasty Warriors Gundam doesn’t stray too much from the classic DW formula, but for hack-and-slash fans, that may not be such a bad thing.
